name: obsidian-ai-agents
description: Create and manage AI agents to automate tasks using Ollama.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && (if not exist "D:\Dreams\Inklet\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-ai-agents\" mkdir "D:\Dreams\Inklet\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-ai-agents\") && copy /Y main.js "D:\Dreams\Inklet\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-ai-agents\" && copy /Y manifest.json "D:\Dreams\Inklet\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-ai-agents\" && copy /Y styles.css "D:\Dreams\Inklet\.obsidian\plugins\obsidian-ai-agents\"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
